WidgetDescription: Integrate Bazaarvoice Conversations (Ratings & Reviews, Q&A) into your IBM WCS storefront.

WidgetDefinitionxml: <Definition>    <widget-manager j2ee="com.ibm.commerce.pagelayout.widget.management.impl.ProductListingWidgetManager"/>    <widget-property name="viewName">     <value>grid</value>    </widget-property>    <widget-property name="requireEMS">     <value>true</value>    </widget-property>    <widget-property name="requireDefaultContent">     <value>true</value>    </widget-property>    <widget-property name="serializeActionPath">     <value>SerializeLayoutWidget-ProductListingWidget</value>    </widget-property>       <widget-property name="ShowProductInNewWindow" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="catalogId" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="storeId" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="catalogEntryID" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="productName" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="productShortDescription" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="partNumber" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="attributes" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="productThumbNail" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="productFullImage" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="altImgText" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="highlightedName" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="highlightedShortDescription" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="buyable" required="false" datatype="java.lang.Boolean"/>    <widget-property name="singleSKU" required="false" datatype="java.lang.Boolean"/>    <widget-property name="isDKPreConfigured" required="false" datatype="java.lang.Boolean"/>    <widget-property name="searchTopCategoryId" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="searchParentCategoryId" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="patternName" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="langId" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="errorViewName" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="clickInfoURL" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="urlLangId" required="false" datatype="java.lang.String"/>    <widget-property name="_pgl:javaScriptInclude">   <value>${staticAssetContextRoot}/Widgets/com.ibm.commerce.store.widgets.CatalogEntryList/javascript/SearchBasedNavigationDisplay.js</value>    </widget-property>   <widget-property name="widgetRestrictionGroups"><value>CategoryPage,SearchPage</value></widget-property></Definition>
WidgetDescription: Display catalog entries that are applicable to the category & search page (incl. BV inline ratings).
